text-snippet.content:
We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors under 16 years of age.
If you are a parent or legal guardian and become aware that your child has provided personal data to us, you can contact us at privacy@ellation.com and request to review and/or delete any unauthorized information provided by your child.
THESE SERVICES ARE INTENDED FOR A MATURE AUDIENCE AND NOT DIRECTED TO CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 16 YEARS OF AGE.

 IF YOU ARE UNDER 16 YEARS OF AGE, THEN YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO USE OR ACCESS THE SERVICES AT ANY TIME OR IN ANY MANNER WITHOUT AN ADULT’S PERMISSION AND SUPERVISION.
